com.cz.library.widget

Class ListIndicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.cz.library.widget.ListIndicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class ListIndicator
extends android.view.View
    Created by cz on 2015/3/19. ListView 侧边指示器 1:指示图形. 圆,方,放大圆心效果 2:指示选择颜色 3:指示器字体大小 4:指示器字体颜色
